short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Attempts to resolve all Ethereum addresses found in the page

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Oh 0x06e6f7D896696167B2dA9281EbAF8a14580fbFCc, I know them" -- said no one ever

Doing web3 business development or just tired of dapps not showing ENS by default? Install this extension and convert all Ethereum addresses in the page with just one click.
